QuestData.Title: Twilight Scheming
QuestData.Description: It wasn't enough for their master to break the world, no! Twilight's Hammer is doing its best to unite our enemies against us, particularly in Blackrock Depths. They've got a whole team of emissaries down there spreading propaganda aimed at starting a joint campaign.$B$BI've always heard that the medium's the message. Well, it's time to destroy the message!$B$BI want you to go into the Domicile of Blackrock Depths and use this torch to burn those Twilight's Hammer books!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Glowing Torch to destroy 8 copies of The Twilight Creed in the Domicile of Blackrock Depths.

Objectives.Objective: Copies of The Twilight Creed burned
